text: Johnny Eager is a 1941 American crime drama movie. It was directed by Mervyn LeRoy. Actors include Robert Taylor, Lana Turner, Van Heflin in his Oscar winning role, Edward Arnold, Glenda Farrell, Diana Lewis, Barry Nelson, and Cy Kendall. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1941 crime movies Category:1940s crime drama movies Category:1941 drama movies Category:1940s American crime drama movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Mervyn LeRoy
title: Johnny Eager
